session_description:
Goal: To connect innovation with strategy, aligning institutions and individuals around a shared AI vision for Bangladesh.

Details: On this day of the MillionX Bangladesh National AI Challenge, titled AI Build-a-thon, is where the nation’s brightest innovators transform ideas into impactful, real-world AI solutions. This full-day event (8:00 AM – 6:00 PM at a University) showcases the top 20 university teams—selected from a nationwide pipeline of 5,000 participants through intensive bootcamps and mentorships—demonstrating working AI prototypes across five national priority domains: EdTech, AgriTech, HealthTech, E-Commerce, and FinTech. Each team will present tangible solutions that address Bangladesh’s most pressing challenges—from personalized learning tutors and AI-powered farming ecosystems to maternal health companions, intelligent supply chains, and financial inclusion engines for the unbanked.

The AI Build-a-thon brings together universities, industry, investors, policymakers, and global experts in one collaborative platform to accelerate Bangladesh’s entry into the AI economy. The day includes live demos, mentorship sessions, and investor networking, culminating in the Young AI Founders Network Awards, where the top five teams receive seed funding, mentorship, and incubation support to scale their ventures nationally and globally.

For university leaders, the event highlights how academia can align AI research with employable innovation; for government policymakers, it demonstrates AI’s role in advancing “Bangladesh - a destination for AI resources” agenda; and for sponsors and corporate partners, it offers an unparalleled opportunity to co-create solutions, talent, and market ecosystems ready for deployment.

The AI Build-a-thon is not just a competition—it is Bangladesh’s bold statement to the world: that a million young minds, empowered by AI, can engineer the nation’s next era of prosperity, inclusion, and global digital leadership.

A cross-sector gathering to explore Bangladesh's AI opportunity and chart a shared path forward

Location: UAP Auditorium, Dhaka, Bangladesh (Tentative)

Overview

MillionX Bangladesh is a national movement founded by Bangladeshi technologists, educators, industry leaders, and global diaspora experts committed to building a generation of 10x minds for a 10x Bangladesh. Our mission is to unlock the country's next wave of economic and social transformation by developing world-class AI talent, strengthening local innovation capacity, and building bridges between Bangladesh and the global technology community.

We are intentionally designed as an ecosystem-driven, nonpartisan, and pro-bono initiative. MillionX brings together youth, universities, industry, government, civil society, and diaspora networks with a shared belief: Bangladesh must not be a passive consumer of the AI era - it must be a contributor.

Following the MillionX Build-A-Thon - where hundreds of young innovators have spent two months developing real-world AI solutions - the Genesis AI Conference connects their energy with national vision, leadership, and long-term collaboration. The Conference is the starting point of a multi-year journey to cultivate talent, inspire partnerships, and shape Bangladesh's AI future.

Rather than attempting to finalise a Bangladesh AI Action Charter in a single day, the Conference presents a Charter Framework (v0.1), gathers structured input, and culminates in the launch of the MillionX Declaration. The refined Charter will be developed collaboratively in the weeks that follow.
AV, stage, lighting, network prep, security
Check-in, badges, table assignment, breakfast
Welcome remarks, rules, judging overview
20 teams demo (7 min each) across 5 zones
Investors, partners, mentors interact with teams
Deep dives, stress tests, advanced Q&A
Scoring + Top 5 selection
Category champions + special awards
National AI roadmap, accelerator, certifications
Organizers pack-up, media summary
Short conversations over tea and coffee.

Setting the Stage for a Collaborative AI Future

  • Opening the formal inauguration of the MillionX Genesis AI Conference featuring welcome remarks, an overview of the event objectives, and reflections on Day 1’s Build-A-Thon Showcase.

  • This session sets the tone for collaboration across government, industry, academia, civil society, and the global Bangladeshi diaspora.

session_title: Vision Keynote: The Future of Artificial Intelligence in Bangladesh
session_description:
How AI Can Improve Lives and Expand Opportunities Across Sectors

  • A cross-sector conversation on how AI can improve lives and expand opportunities across key areas such as healthcare, education, agriculture, finance, and social development.

  • The discussion focuses on responsible adoption, data stewardship, and practical pathways to ensure that AI contributes meaningfully to inclusive and sustainable growth in Bangladesh.

session_description: Relaxed, networking-focused lunch to keep cross-sector conversations flowing.

session_title: Building Bangladesh's AI Talent & Innovation Ecosystem
session_description:
The 10x Talent Movement + Global Bangladeshi AI Network + Collaboration Pathways

  • A combined ecosystem session exploring how Bangladesh can build a strong AI talent pipeline by linking local universities, industry, and innovators with the global Bangladeshi AI community.

  • The session highlights skills development, research collaboration, diaspora expertise, and partnership pathways that strengthen the country’s AI readiness and innovation capacity.
session_type: Building Bangladesh's AI Talent & Innovation Ecosystem

session_title: Bangladesh AI Action Charter + Leadership Perspectives
session_description:
Charting the Road Ahead for Bangladesh's AI Journey

  • A closing session presenting the Bangladesh AI Action Charter Framework (v0.1) and gathering structured input from participants.

  • This is followed by short reflections from senior leaders across government, industry, academia, civil society, and the global diaspora on Bangladesh’s AI future.

  • The session concludes with launch announcements for the MillionX Volunteer Network, Global Network, and Partner Pledge Programme.
session_type: Bangladesh AI Action Charter & Leadership Perspectives

session_description: Light refreshments, VIP interviews, and casual conversations to close the day.
